fields.name: Q1 EE Committee Meeting - Annual Planning
fields.description: First quarter Employment Equity committee meeting focused on annual planning, goal setting, and previous year report review

default_agenda.title: Review of Previous Year's EE Report Submission
default_agenda.description: Submission confirmation and acknowledgment, Any feedback from DEL

default_agenda.title: Annual EE Plan Review
default_agenda.description: Current plan status and validity period, Goals achievement from previous year, Updated numerical goals for new reporting year

default_agenda.title: Workforce Analysis Update
default_agenda.description: Current workforce profile review, Designated group representation status, Occupational level distribution

default_agenda.title: EE Objectives and Targets for New Year
default_agenda.description: Recruitment targets by designated group, Promotion and advancement targets, Training and development priorities

default_agenda.title: Committee Administration
default_agenda.description: Member roster update, Role confirmations

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Next Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Bring previous year EE report, DEL feedback letters, current workforce profile data

fields.name: Q2 EE Committee Meeting - Workforce Analysis
fields.description: Second quarter Employment Equity committee meeting focused on detailed workforce analysis and barrier identification

default_agenda.title: Workforce Analysis Deep Dive
default_agenda.description: Detailed demographic breakdown by occupational level, Comparison to Regional EAP targets, Gap analysis by designated group, Under-representation areas identified

default_agenda.title: Barriers to Employment Equity
default_agenda.description: Review of identified barriers, New barriers identification, Categorization (recruitment, advancement, retention, working conditions), Root cause analysis

default_agenda.title: Affirmative Action Measures
default_agenda.description: Review of existing measures, Effectiveness assessment, New measures proposed, Responsible persons and timelines

default_agenda.title: Income Differential Analysis
default_agenda.description: Salary gap review by occupational level, Actions to address unjustifiable differentials

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Next Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare detailed workforce breakdown, EAP data, income differential analysis

fields.name: Q3 EE Committee Meeting - Progress Review
fields.description: Third quarter Employment Equity committee meeting focused on mid-year progress review and corrective actions

default_agenda.title: Mid-Year Progress Review
default_agenda.description: Numerical goals progress assessment, Recruitment achievements vs targets, Promotions and advancement progress, Training completions for designated groups

default_agenda.title: Affirmative Action Measures Progress
default_agenda.description: Status update on each measure, Effectiveness evaluation, Adjustments required

default_agenda.title: Barrier Remediation Progress
default_agenda.description: Actions taken to address barriers, Remaining challenges, Additional resources needed

default_agenda.title: Workforce Profile Changes
default_agenda.description: Appointments, promotions, terminations, Impact on EE targets, Designated group movement

default_agenda.title: Corrective Actions Required
default_agenda.description: Areas behind target, Acceleration strategies, Resource allocation

default_agenda.title: EE Report Preparation Planning
default_agenda.description: Data collection timeline, Documentation requirements, Committee sign-off process

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Next Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare mid-year progress report, barrier status update, corrective action proposals

fields.name: Q4 EE Committee Meeting - Annual Report Preparation
fields.description: Fourth quarter Employment Equity committee meeting focused on annual EE report finalization and submission preparation

default_agenda.title: Annual EE Report Preparation
default_agenda.description: EEA2 Form review and verification, EEA4 Form (Income Differential) review, Supporting documentation checklist

default_agenda.title: Workforce Profile Final Review
default_agenda.description: End of reporting year snapshot (30 September), Year-on-year comparison, Designated group representation summary

default_agenda.title: Numerical Goals Achievement
default_agenda.description: Final status on all targets, Variance analysis and explanations, Successes and challenges

default_agenda.title: Affirmative Action Measures Summary
default_agenda.description: Completed measures, Ongoing initiatives, Measures for next year

default_agenda.title: EE Plan Status
default_agenda.description: Current plan validity, Plan revision requirements, New plan preparation if expiring

default_agenda.title: Committee Attestation
default_agenda.description: Review of report accuracy, Committee approval for submission, Signatures required

default_agenda.title: Submission Timeline
default_agenda.description: Online submission deadline (15 January), Responsible persons, Backup procedures

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Q1 Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare draft EEA2 and EEA4 forms, final workforce profile, numerical goals achievement report

fields.name: Combined Training & EE Committee Meeting - Q1
fields.description: First quarter combined Training and Employment Equity committee meeting for organizations with integrated committee structure

default_agenda.title: PART A: TRAINING MATTERS - WSP/ATR Previous Year Review
default_agenda.description: Submission status, Training achievements vs planned, Pivotal and non-pivotal training summary

default_agenda.title: Annual Training Plan Development
default_agenda.description: Skills needs analysis, Training priorities for new year, Budget allocation

default_agenda.title: Bursary and Learnership Programs
default_agenda.description: Current commitments, New applications

default_agenda.title: PART B: EE MATTERS - Previous Year EE Report Review
default_agenda.description: Submission confirmation, DEL feedback (if any)

default_agenda.title: Workforce Profile Analysis
default_agenda.description: Current demographics, Designated group representation

default_agenda.title: EE Numerical Goals Update
default_agenda.description: Previous year achievements, New year targets

default_agenda.title: Barriers and Affirmative Action Measures
default_agenda.description: Status update

default_agenda.title: PART C: INTEGRATED PLANNING
default_agenda.description: Skills development for designated groups, Training aligned to EE goals, Development programs for advancement

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Next Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare both WSP/ATR and EE documentation, integrated skills-EE planning materials

fields.name: Combined Training & EE Committee Meeting - Q2
fields.description: Second quarter combined Training and Employment Equity committee meeting for organizations with integrated committee structure

default_agenda.title: PART A: TRAINING MATTERS - Implementation Progress
default_agenda.description: Q1 training completions, Upcoming Q2 training schedule, Trainer and venue arrangements

default_agenda.title: Learnership and Internship Updates
default_agenda.description: Current learner progress, Completion forecasts

default_agenda.title: Training Budget Utilization
default_agenda.description: Expenditure to date, Projections

default_agenda.title: PART B: EE MATTERS - Detailed Workforce Analysis
default_agenda.description: Occupational level breakdown, Under-representation areas, Gap to EAP targets

default_agenda.title: Barrier Identification and Analysis
default_agenda.description: Barriers review, Root causes, Proposed remediation

default_agenda.title: Affirmative Action Measures
default_agenda.description: Effectiveness review, New measures

default_agenda.title: PART C: INTEGRATED PLANNING
default_agenda.description: Skills development impact on EE, Training supporting designated group advancement, Career pathing initiatives

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Next Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare training progress report, detailed workforce analysis, income differential data

fields.name: Combined Training & EE Committee Meeting - Q3
fields.description: Third quarter combined Training and Employment Equity committee meeting for organizations with integrated committee structure

default_agenda.title: PART A: TRAINING MATTERS - Mid-Year Training Review
default_agenda.description: ATR progress (April-September), Training completions summary, Quality and effectiveness assessment

default_agenda.title: Skills Audit Updates
default_agenda.description: New skills requirements, Training plan adjustments

default_agenda.title: WSP Preparation Planning
default_agenda.description: Data collection timeline, Consultation requirements

default_agenda.title: PART B: EE MATTERS - Mid-Year EE Progress Review
default_agenda.description: Numerical goals tracking, Recruitment and promotion progress

default_agenda.title: Affirmative Action Progress
default_agenda.description: Measures implementation status, Corrective actions needed

default_agenda.title: EE Report Preparation Planning
default_agenda.description: Data requirements, Timeline to submission

default_agenda.title: PART C: INTEGRATED PLANNING
default_agenda.description: Designated group development progress, Training supporting EE goals, Succession planning updates

default_agenda.title: Year-End Planning
default_agenda.description: Remaining training priorities, EE targets acceleration

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Next Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare mid-year training review, EE progress report, year-end planning documents

fields.name: Combined Training & EE Committee Meeting - Q4
fields.description: Fourth quarter combined Training and Employment Equity committee meeting for organizations with integrated committee structure

default_agenda.title: PART A: TRAINING MATTERS - Annual Training Report Finalization
default_agenda.description: ATR data verification, Training achievements summary, Budget utilization final

default_agenda.title: WSP Development
default_agenda.description: Next year training needs, Priority skills areas, Budget requirements

default_agenda.title: PART B: EE MATTERS - Annual EE Report Finalization
default_agenda.description: EEA2 and EEA4 review, Workforce profile verification, Numerical goals final status

default_agenda.title: EE Plan Review
default_agenda.description: Plan validity status, Revision requirements

default_agenda.title: Committee Attestation for EE Report
default_agenda.description: Accuracy verification, Approval for submission

default_agenda.title: PART C: INTEGRATED PLANNING
default_agenda.description: Alignment of Training and EE for next year, Skills development supporting EE targets

default_agenda.title: Submission Timelines
default_agenda.description: EE Report: 15 January, WSP/ATR: 30 April

default_agenda.title: Date and Agenda for Q1 Meeting

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare draft WSP/ATR and EE reports, submission checklists, next year planning documents

fields.name: EE Committee - Special Meeting (Plan Development)
fields.description: Special Employment Equity committee meeting for developing or revising the EE Plan

default_agenda.title: EE Plan Requirements Overview
default_agenda.description: Statutory requirements (Section 20), Plan duration (1-5 years), Required components

default_agenda.title: Workforce Analysis Review
default_agenda.description: Current demographic profile, Designated group representation, Under-representation analysis, Comparison to Regional EAP

default_agenda.title: Barrier Analysis
default_agenda.description: Identified barriers summary, Prioritization of barriers, Affirmative action measures proposed

default_agenda.title: Numerical Goals Development
default_agenda.description: Methodology for target setting, Annual targets by occupational level, Designated group-specific goals, Reasonableness assessment

default_agenda.title: Affirmative Action Measures
default_agenda.description: Recruitment measures, Advancement and promotion measures, Training and development measures, Retention measures, Reasonable accommodation measures

default_agenda.title: Implementation Timeline
default_agenda.description: Annual milestones, Responsible persons, Resource requirements

default_agenda.title: Monitoring and Evaluation Framework
default_agenda.description: Progress tracking mechanisms, Reporting frequency, Corrective action procedures

default_agenda.title: Plan Document Review
default_agenda.description: Draft plan walkthrough, Committee input and revisions

default_agenda.title: Plan Approval
default_agenda.description: Committee endorsement, CEO/Accounting Officer sign-off process

default_agenda.title: Communication Plan
default_agenda.description: Employee awareness, Display requirements

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare draft EE Plan document, workforce analysis data, barrier analysis, proposed numerical goals

fields.name: EE Committee - Special Meeting (Barrier Investigation)
fields.description: Special Employment Equity committee meeting for investigating specific barriers to employment equity

default_agenda.title: Barrier Under Investigation
default_agenda.description: Description of barrier, Impact on designated groups, How it was identified

default_agenda.title: Data and Evidence Review
default_agenda.description: Workforce data analysis, Employee feedback/complaints, HR process review, External benchmarking

default_agenda.title: Root Cause Analysis
default_agenda.description: Contributing factors, Historical context, Systemic issues

default_agenda.title: Stakeholder Input
default_agenda.description: Affected group representatives, Line management perspective, HR input

default_agenda.title: Proposed Remedial Actions
default_agenda.description: Short-term interventions, Long-term solutions, Policy/procedure changes, Training requirements

default_agenda.title: Resource Requirements
default_agenda.description: Budget implications, Personnel requirements, Timeline considerations

default_agenda.title: Success Metrics
default_agenda.description: How improvement will be measured, Monitoring frequency, Reporting mechanism

default_agenda.title: Responsibilities Assignment
default_agenda.description: Action owners, Deadlines, Escalation procedures

fields.preparation_notes: Prepare barrier investigation report, evidence documentation, stakeholder input summaries
